name: The 5th Int'l Symposium on Quantum Computation and Communication
content: The 5th Int'l Symposium on Quantum Computation and Communication (SQCC 2024) will be held on November 15-17, 2024 in Sanya, China. SQCC 2024 will cover issues on Photonic quantum systems, Quantum algorithms and complexity, Quantum circuits, Quantum communication, Quantum computing, Quantum Information Theory etc. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods.
